text: The 2019 UEC European Track Championships (under-23 & junior) was the 19th continental championships for European under-23 and junior track cyclists, and the 10th since the event was renamed following the reorganisation of European track cycling in 2010. The event took place at the Vlaams Wielercentrum Eddy Merckx in Ghent, Belgium from 9 to 14 July 2019.Technical Guide ==Medal summary== ===Under-23=== {| |- style="background:#ccc; width:100%;" |colspan=7 align=center| Men's Events |- |SprintMen's under-23 sprint results |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |- |Team sprintMen's under-23 team sprint results |valign="top"| Koen van der Wijst Harrie Lavreysen Sam Ligtlee || 43.783 | Melvin Landerneau Sébastien Vigier Rayan Helal Florian Grengbo || 44.031 | Daniil Komkov Alexey Nosov Pavel Rostov Dmitry Nesterov || 44.223 |- |1 km time trialMen's under-23 1 km time trial results | || 1:01.571 | || 1:01.624 | || 1:01.826 |- |KeirinMen's under-23 keirin results |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |- |Individual pursuitMen's under-23 individual pursuit results | || 4:12.895 | || 4:16.049 | || 4:17.816 |- |Team pursuitMen's under-23 team pursuit results | Ivan Smirnov Gleb Syritsa Dmitry Mukhomediarov Lev Gonov Nikita Bersenev || 3:53.843 |valign="top"| Fabio Van den Bossche Robbe Ghys Gerben Thijssen Sasha Weemaes || 3:59.100 |valign="top"| Robin Froidevaux Valère Thiébaud Mauro Schmid Alex Vogel || 3:56.963 |- |Points raceMen's under-23 points race results | || 71 Points | || 59 Points | || 38 Points |- |ScratchMen's under-23 scratch results |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |- |MadisonMen's under-23 madison results | Matthew Walls Fred Wright || 49 Points | Donavan Grondin Thomas Denis || 31 Points | Robin Froidevaux Mauro Schmid || 29 Points |- |OmniumMen's under-23 omnium results | || 138 Points | || 118 Points | || 113 Points |- |Elimination raceMen's under-23 elimination race results |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |colspan=2| |- style="background:#ccc;
